title: View: Automaker Ola Electricâ€™s IPO is putting Modinomics to the test
description: Ola Electric, a significant Indian automaker, saw its IPO shares soar by 42% early on. The company's future success is closely tied to government policies and subsidies for electric vehicles. Past reductions in incentives impacted demand, indicating the challenges ahead in relying on state support for sustained growth.
